tool_description:
Translate text into other languages. 
Can translate long texts, fast processing, cost-effective.
name: Long Translator
title: Long Translator

api_list.name: languages
api_list.description: This endpoint is used to get a list of available language codes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://long-translator.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "long-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://long-translator.p.rapidapi.com/languages"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "long-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
